evidence_in_dialogue: [[Brass]] dr clark and his 'steady hand ' have n't been seen or heard from since , so you do n't have to be a brain surgeon to guess what i 'm thinking
[[Warrick]] brass is looking for a ghost
[[Sara]] lucky for us ... we got a skin tag
[[Catherine]] a killer with knowledge of anatomy whose tool is a scalpel
[[Grissom]] you killed them both , and now you have nothing
